data.title: Fast C Site Retake Dart From C Link
data.description: Use this powerful retake dart to allow yourself to scale the site with your teammates.

data.title: C Site Retake Dart From C Link
data.description: Here's a strong retake dart you can use to clear all of site, it also scans a bit into the cubby at C Long.

data.title: Early Round Info Dart to C Long From C Spawn
data.description: Use this dart for early information at C Long, or to set up a play from Garage or C Site.

data.title: Default Early Info Dart for A Lobby From A Long
data.description: Use this dart lineup to gain early information on Attackers on the A side of the map, this will scan a little bit outside the lobby as well.

data.title: Shockdart to Harass A Site Bomb Planter
data.description: Use this simple, yet effective Shockdart for the A bomb planter at Default.

data.title: C Link To Left B Site Default Shock Bolt
data.description: This is simple, but effective, Shock Bolt for the left Default Spike plant spot. Make sure you don't use this when you are exposed to enemy players in B Site, unless you are certain they have not pushed far enough into B Site to pose a threat.

data.title: Right Side B Site To Mid Window Recon Bolt
data.description: This is a great Recon Bolt for Mid Window that lands quickly, and has an easy setup.

data.title: Defender Side Spawn To A Site Reconbolt
data.description: This is useful for revealing players under A Tower and the angles within view of the back side of Default.
